name: WSG: Halloween Theme
description:
A black and orange theme for WSGRPG.
PM Sinister on the RPG if you have any suggestions.
additional_info:
August 20, 2016: Update 3
* Styled the login divs. August 18, 2016: Update 2
* Styled tooltips since I derped out and forgot about them. August 16, 2016: Update 1
